meanings.definition: Relating to or being a pair of atoms or groups situated on the same carbon atom in a molecule.
meanings.sent1: The geminal atoms shared the same carbon atom in the molecule.
meanings.sent2: The geminal groups were positioned on the identical carbon atom.
meanings.sent3: The geminal atoms decided to throw a party on the carbon atom.
meanings.sent4: Their bond was as strong as the geminal atoms on the carbon atom.
meanings.sent5: The geminal arrangement on the carbon atom was like a synchronized dance.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to twins or a pair of similar things.
meanings.sent1: The geminal twins looked identical in every way.
meanings.sent2: The geminal objects were so alike, they could be mistaken for twins.
meanings.sent3: The geminal shoes always ended up getting mixed up.
meanings.sent4: Their geminal appearance made them stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The geminal flowers in the garden bloomed side by side, mirroring each other.

meanings.sent1: The geminal stars shone brightly together in the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The geminal earrings were a perfect match.
meanings.sent3: The geminal socks always seemed to disappear in pairs.
meanings.sent4: Their geminal relationship was unbreakable, like a pair of magnets.
meanings.sent5: The geminal keys unlocked the mysteries of the old chest together.
